title: Charles Pinckney National Historic Site: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions         Fort Sumter from Tour Boat NPS Photo  National Park Service Sites Visit Fort Sumter National Monument (including Fort Moultrie)  Â     Other Attractions and Events (in alphabetical order) Boone Hall PlantationCharleston County Parks & Recreation Commission Charleston Museum Patriots Point Naval & Maritime Museum South Carolina AquariumSouth Carolina Parks Sweetgrass Cultural Arts Festival    For more information on the Charleston area, visit the Charleston Area Convention & Visitors Bureau.
